resources.string: BookMySlot is a full-stack slot and resource booking website with additional features like self-covid assessment and many other personalized features. This website is basically for students of MIT to allow them to book slots beforehand during this pandemic to avoid over-crowding and have an efficient sports resource allocator. This will also allow interested people to donate money. This website will have user friendly UX and clean UI.

1. Java for back-end
2.XML for front-end
3.Firebase realtime database
4.Razorpay for payment gateway
5.covid19india.org for API
Have you been in close contact with a confirmed case of coronavirus?
Are you currently experiencing symptoms (cough, shortness of breath, fever)
"Have you been tested for COVID-19 and are waiting to receive test results? "
